Alright I need to put my 37 cents in on this. I am for who will ever do the best job. Honestly from the short time Mike has been working on these forums his work has been leaps and bounds better than Dragons. Mike has also spoiled us with he expedience combined with the enormous progress made in a little more than three weeks! Dragon has not put out anything or updated anything in months! Is there any guarantee jovzin that when your model is completed that we will get a release from dragon anytime soon? This loyalty to dragon confuses the hell out of me. We made a mistake 5 months ago with raidernick. He began working on updating the CSS and everyone all but pushed him off the project because he couldn't stand people asking questions about Dragon. Now we have another incredible modder working on this project and again we are referring back to dragon. Until he shows his face or releases a substantive update sometime this year we need to work with the people who are currently doing an amazing job. Mike and Jovzin lets just take a step back and agree that you guys had a miscommunication and lack of communication. From here on out you need to work together both of you have done an amazing job and together you can create an amazing orbiter. Mike with your ability to incorporate features and jovzin with your modeling ability I see no reason why you can't work together. Please please work together, there should be no animosity it just looks like miscommunication and missed messages.

So I say this: bring on the competition and may the best shuttle win ;-)
